responsibility for their implementation (14 countries; 26%) and review (12 countries; 23%) is undertaken jointly 
by both governmental authorities and professional bodies (Fig. 7.9). Few rely on governmental authorities alone 
for implementation (four countries) or review (six countries), while one country relies solely on professional 
bodies. No information was provided by 34 countries.
